about_me.des: I am a computer engineer and I make a living developing enterprise Java applications. Life is a continuous learning process, I invite you to accompany me on the road.

projects.SPRING_LDAP_MANAGEMENT: project with which we make a product for managing an LDAP from a web manager.
projects.JasperReports: This is a web project with spring that is able to generate reports from templates jasper reports.

career.SATEC_des: SATEC working on developing business applications.
career.AXPE_des: (Abril 2008-marzo 2014) Consulting, Project Management Produban/ISBAN group Santander.
career.NEXT_des: (Febrero 2007-Abril 2008) Development persistence framework for Gerencia informática de la Seg. social.
career.college_des: At December 2005,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
